1.content:
Now let's round out the choices for the Abductee

What Age/Age Range shall they be?


*** Edit 9/19/2017
Introducing the Mega-Verse option.
Got this twist from various sources and thoughts.

In this option or path the aliens, alien zoo etc still exist
but there's some twists.

The size change victim and abductee starts out normal size still.

The twists are as follows
1 > The Mega-Verse-ians doing the abduction are even bigger.
2 > New Mars is now infinitely bigger than earth so large no human could comprehend it yet to the aliens it and its surrounding planets are microscopic humans even more so.

3 > Why so much size difference?
Well this zoo exhibit is to view how a human reacts to and handles an Evergrowth scenario.

****
1.title: Age of the "victim" ( using the term loosely )

11.content:
Whom shall the young tyke be who innocently learns the meaning of growing pains minus the pain?


Yuka
Age 4
Pink Hair Purple Eyes
https://twitter.com/pklewd2015/status/62...

-----------------------------

Baby Maron
Brown hair
Green Eyes
https://twitter.com/pklewd2015/status/62...

Toddler

https://twitter.com/pklewd2015/status/61...
11.title: 4 years old or Younger

choices: Young Yuka steps onto the pad! A Giant wasn't what she had in mind
111.content:
Yuka was your average 14 year old girl.
Everything was fine till a certain series of events.


She should have known better than take that "juice"
from her rival Ella.


Yuka ran to the solo bathroom in the nurses office.
She felt very strange for the last few minutes.
Outside she heard familiar taunting.

"Ha ha now the baby is going to match how she acts. Too bad for you that it'll last until you get the cure from me"


Yuka was about to question what would last when she noticed her clothes becoming loose.

Seconds before she started to shrink she was unaware that a teleportation device had locked onto her DNA.
Smaller and smaller she shrunk till nothing fit.

She was a bit dazed.
https://mobile.twitter.com/pklewd2015/st...

Before she could react much a beam entered the window which was 4 stories up.
Yuka was suddenly transported somewhere without even her now ill fitting clothes.


Ella opened the door to see just clothes and freaked.

"Oh crap oh crap that elixir was too strong I erased her from existence"



Meanwhile Yuka reappeared in a bathroom similar to the one she was just in except there was a mirror on the door and her clothes were gone.
She went wide eyed.

"Oh my god I didn't swink I turned back to 3 years old. I even have my little kid voice"

She then had to use the toilet.
Afterward she was still less than thrilled.


"Thank god I'm still potty twained. Now I just wish I didn't sound so weird"

She then noticed she was in the buff.
"Eh I need clothes"
She then later eyes on the only clothes she'd get.
A pair of white panties with pink polka dots.


She put them on.
Next she poked her head out and noticed she was still in school but it was eerily quiet.
She stepped out to explore.
The halls and classrooms were ALL Empty.
She stepped outside and noticed a strange gold pad with a sign saying "GROW RAY"
It gave Yuka a childish idea befitting her regressed body.



Maybe it would fix her.
111.title: Yes Yuka

choices: Might as well play around a bit as a giant
1111.content:
The young little Yuka steps onto the pad as she hopes that she can fix her regressive body issue. "Hopefully this ray will get me back to normal." She said sheepishly just as she then is hit by the beam.


The beam seems to have some effect on her since she screamed for a second, and then the effects begin to happen.


Suddenly, Yuka started going upward as the rest of the world begins to go down to her. Yuka notices this just as the world around here begun to got smaller around here.



Soon, she was 50 feet tall, still in her panties. She then notices that she is a good size compared to the school right 4 stories tall next to her, and then she said.

"Uh oh... didn't expect that at all." She said.

What does she do now?

---
**moderators note
Edited 6/21/17 1127am for spacing, grammar , story flow and minor issues
1111.title: Young Yuka steps onto the pad! A Giant wasn'...

choices: She sits on a 3x Growth pad becoming 200 Feet Tall
She sits on a shrink ray becoming 2 1/2 inches tall
The growth ray wears off returning her to normal 3 year old size
Nothing, she sits on the building with little problems or incident
11111.content:
This was certainly an unexpected turn of events for Yuka.
In the span of an hour she had turned back into her 3 year old self but remained mentally mostly unchanged.
https://mobile.twitter.com/pklewd2015/st...

Now here was her 3 year old self in only her panties but 50 feet tall outside what appeared to be her school.

She looked at the school roof with which she was just slightly taller then.

"Well so much for fixing my age but I guess at least I'm not short no more. Gee things sure look difwent now. I just wish I also didn't have this childwish voice. Guess standing here isn't going to acwompwish much tho nor fix my talking"


With that Yuka started walking towards the neighborhood she and Ella lived in.
As she did she noticed her footsteps shake the ground slightly.


Meanwhile with the aliens who abducted her.

"What did you say this girls statistics were again?"


"It appears someone made a typo. The initial report said she was 14.7 earth years.
We have however corrected the faulty intel and dishonorably discharged the one responsible.
Corrected statistics indicate her earth name is Yuka
Current age 3.4 earth years
IQ quite above normal for her age tho. She's quite the odd earth child. Regardless of the fools prior mistakes the atmospheric aging inhibitors have been adjusted to reflect this age so changes or adjustment at this point should be impossible.
We haven't accurately updated height , weight and other measurements at her normal size yet.
We request to extend the observation period by 6 hours before putting this exhibit on display"



"Hmm very well just remember smart or not this earth child can't be allowed to know too much.
Remember all she can be allowed is her knowledge before coming here, the layout of her new earth , the size rays workings and effects, and anything she learns about herself here.
All other stuff is to be limited and if necessary selectively neurolize her memory."



"Yes sir"

Yuka meanwhile had only walked 2 blocks. She had been taking her time.
She stops.

"You know it's weird I haven't eaten for hours yet all I'm feeling is thirsty"

Yuka looks around and notices some buildings smaller than her and many taller.

"Hmm I think I should take a seat and think this all through. I hope this building is as empty as school was"

With that she began to sit down on the roof of a small store.
As she did though...
11111.title: Explore the area a bit

choices: Yuka uses the same Growth pad again
Yuka accidentally encountered a shrinking pad
Yuka searches for something to drink
11113.content:
Warning potential uncomfortable topic/description later with regards to body functions.
-----------/------/------/-----/----/-----------/--------/

Yuka looked straight ahead at the school rooftop that she was now slightly taller than.

"Well this is certainwe interwesting. I'm a kid but now I'm too big for school."

Without thinking she reached over to 1 of the vending machines on the roof damaging the fence in the process.
She couldn't pick it up with one hand but she poked it. The front of the soda machine crunched inward on itself then several cans fell out.

"Wow I'm so much stwonger now. I was a bit thirsty tho"

She picked up a few cans and tossed them down her throat.
Next she looked around.

"Hmm I should see if I can find anyone"

With that she took a few steps finally realizing her steps now caused small vibrations.
She also noticed her feet left decent impressions on the school lawn.
She also noticed the ground felt pleasantly cool to her bare feet.


She took a few more steps to the side of the school building. Still there was no one.
She decided to check behind the school to be sure. She walked carefully through the school parking lot and around to the back of the building.


Behind the school was where the track, field and school pool were. Again it was deserted.
Then another problem of sorts reared its head.


"Uh oh I gotta go potty again only there's no potty big enough around here! And I can't stop talking like a whiddle kid to boot"


Yuka looked around desperately. Unfortunately she was right there were no facilities for someone her size in sight. She saw the empty school pool and got an idea she didn't like but appeared to be her only option.


Yuka quickly grabbed some building materials from the lot next to her school that was a construction site and tore all the trees on school campus out of the ground.
As she did this her urge to go got steadily stronger and harder to hold in.


She then proceeded to build a wall as tall as the school around the pool. She only need to do 3 sides as the school building would act as her shield from the 4th angle.


Finally she was nearing her limits.

"I'm sorry whoever has to clean the pool"

With that she took off her panties and squatted in front of the pool. She then let it flow with more force than a fire hose. A few minutes later she finished and got her panties back on.


The pool was now just over 1/4 full of bright yellow. Yuka went over to the makeshift gate she'd put in her wall and pushed it open. Suddenly she felt strange.
Her body then began to flicker like a projector.


"Huh what happening?"

It didn't take long for an answer.
There was a flash of light and a cloud of smoke.
Moments later there stood Yuka back to normal little girl size.

Next...
11113.title: The ray wears off

choices: Comes across an abandoned refreshment cart
Comes across a 2x Grow Ray ( 100 FT Tall this time )
Comes across a Shrink Ray ( 2 inches tall )
111133.content:
Now back to normal little girl size the strong stench of her urine was easily noticeable whereas at her previous size it would have seemingly smelled no stronger than normal.


The stench along with the fact she was thirsty again was enough to make Yuka wander off.
She was slowly coming to terms with having been regressed back to childhood.
As she searched out another drink though these size rays gave her more thoughts.
Being a size changing child might not be all bad and might even prove interesting.


Yuka continued seeking out something to drink and...
111133.title: Yuka searches for something to drink

1113.content:
What she hadn't noticed was words being painted over.
The sign in fact said "EVER GROWTH RAY" with a disclaimer in small alien text warning that it would cause the one exposed to it to have random continued growth spurts until cured.


Of course the aliens who abducted Yuka weren't concerned.
In fact Yuka didn't realize how microscopic she was in comparison to the planet she was on much the surrounding planets and her captors.
She was unaware she was part of an experiment and zoo in the "Mega-Verse"
( see edits in interactive description as well as chapter 1 )

The planet she was on was literally billions of times the size of earth
the surrounding planets larger still and the aliens unfathomably larger.


To them Yuka and the makeshift solar system they created for were all microbes.
Yuka's new universe was there merely to contain her even once she outgrew her fake Earth
Just to be safe though her universe was actually just a universe within a universe within yet another universe.
These 3 universes were each larger than the next and fashioned to allow the Earth child as they viewed her plenty of room to grow and explore yet give her nutrition and keep her from aging.


Anyway back to Yuka....


The young little Yuka steps onto the pad as she hopes that she can fix her regressive body issue. "Hopefully this ray will get me back to normal." She said sheepishly just as she then is hit by the lightning bolt like beam.


She gets zapped almost as if being shocked but is somehow unharmed.
It lasts a few minutes then stops.
Yuka looks around.
The device seems to have had no effect on her.


"Aww it didn't work I'm still widdle"

Yuka walked off sadly.
However a few minutes later Yuka felt strange.
She shrugged it off.
A faint glow surrounded her.


Suddenly she was starting to grow.
Her panties were growing with her.
That coupled with the fact she was so focused on fixing her age problem among other things kept her from even noticing she was slowly growing.


Yuka's growth soon ended with her being an unusually tall 5 foot tall 3 year old version of herself.

https://mobile.twitter.com/pklewd2015/st...

Yuka continued to look around the school for something to help unaware the ray had worked sort of or that
she had what would be the 1st of many growth spurts.
1113.title: Readers choice

choices: This beam wears off already! Back to normal for now....
113.content:
https://twitter.com/pklewd2015/status/63...


---------





It was a seemingly typical day. A family was getting ready for a get together.



Their youngest son Kouta was playing in the backyard. 1 of their daughters went to go bring him in and came out just in time to see some kind of light surrounding him and then him slowly fading away.




Moments later Kouta found himself sitting in a seemingly deserted park in the middle of a seemingly deserted city that was in every way a replica of Earth except some buildings were scaled sizes fit for a giantess or in Kouta's possible a giant.



The toddler looked around curiously then shakily stood up. There were trees around the clearing he was in.


Kouta shakily toddled/walked forward. A couple minutes late Kouta unknowingly came to his 1st size ray.


There was a golden platform with a sign labeled "GROW RAY"
https://twitter.com/pklewd2015/status/63...


Of course Kouta couldn't read.


Kouta curiously stepped forward. As soon as he was on the platform a pressure sensor seemed to trigger. A beam shot out of the center of the plate. There was a bright flash and suddenly Kouta was now standing 50 Feet tall with one socked foot still on the plate.


Ever few seconds the beam would fire again but seemed to have no effect. Little did he know the beams effects were temporary or that every time the same beam hit him the clock reset on his change.



Kouta looked around curious and confused over the change. After a few minutes of getting hit by the beam he stepped off the plate and it stopped firing.



Kouta didn't notice the ground rumble ever so slightly as he took steps towards a nearby tree he was eye level with now.


He poked it snapping a branch.
Next.....
113.title: Kouta on New Mars

choices: He starts climbing the tallest building
He searches for another growth pad
1132.content:
He started to walk around the area a little bit more, and as he walked around, the ground started to rumble a bit. Things that were on the ground started to fly a bit right into the air like trash that was somehow knocked from the trash can onto the ground.



Soon the baby was walking right onto a road on a street and he even sees some cars in the area. As the baby continued the walk around, he ends up crushing one right under his foot, and he kinda gasped at the moment just as he backed away right into a building. The moment that he made contact with the building, the building broke about and collasped under the giant baby, or at least a good chunk of it.



After a few more moments, the baby got right back up its feet. Then suddenly...
1132.title: A Giant Baby In The City

choices: Switch to Kouta being viewed in this freaky universe sized zoo
Kouta and playtime cut short. The 1st size ray is wearing off
11321.content:
He not exactly rampages per say but Kouta does explore some more or possibly play a bit innocently unaware of any of the following-
His size changes
His predicament
That the damage he did was real and his actual caretakers aka the aliens slaves had to fix all later.
That his size changes could be temporary or that he was being watched.


To him it was all innocent playtime or curiousity

Next
11321.title: He rampages through the city

choices: Kouta just goes for a walk
113212.content:
The alien masterminds behind this "Universal Mega Zoo" remain hidden but those tasked with running things did not.


"Exhibit number 1E01A seems to be fine so far. We've begun the 48 hour observation period before exhibit is open to public viewing. The hidden caretakers are in place.


They've been given instructions based on how humans care for their young in modern times.
Food synthesizers have been tested and are ready.
Should the child require a diaper change a quantum and temporal stasis will be intitiated, the soiled materials will be teleported to solar star number 766 for instant incineration and replacements teleported onto its body's.
Essentially save some confusion the subject will be oblivious to getting a diaper change.


Other protocols are in place to ensure subjects safety and care regardless of size.
The atomospher has also been altered so that the subject won't age until we decide we are ready or release him.

Caretaker repairs to structures and more will occur when subject is either asleep or not in a previously damaged sector.
That concludes the intitial report"

Read an alien in a lab coat


Back with Kouta who was for now still 50 foot tall
Stood near the building he'd slightly damaged by accident.
113212.title: Switch to Kouta being viewed in this freaky uni...

1132121.content:
Kouta after standing up and looking at the building he'd accidentally damaged which he was slightly taller than he was slightly curious.


He walked over in about 3 steps to the building on its left which was level with his forehead.
Facing the building he reached up his right hand and extended his index finger.


He then moved it forward.
Unfortunately unaware of his strength he reached forward and pressed intolerant the building.
It was just fast and strong enough that Kouta essentially poked a hole the size of his finger right thru the wall with a few cracks coming from the hole.


Kouta's face formed an O

He then looked in the hole with one eye.


Pulling away he clapped and giggled apparently entertained.


The block this building was on had a few more equal sized buildings.
Kouta went to the 3rd building.



This time he pressed his finger "lightly" to the face of the building.
Slowly he added more pressure.
Spider cracks began forming in the building.
Just as it was about to break he stopped.
Once more Kouta claps and giggles.


Next he moves to the 4th building.
This time he spotted thru a window a normal size baby bottle on a table.


Without much thought or effort he reaches forward his fist busting the window and glass doing no harm at his size.
His fist breaks a few pieces of furniture but grabs the bottle. It only takes him 3 fingers for his hand to grab it at his size.
He brings it to his mouth and squeezes trying to get a drink.
Having no luck he tossed the bottle while in his mouth and swallowed.



Suddenly Kouta felt strange.
His body then begin to flicker almost as if he himself were a hologram or projection.
He looked at his body and giggled.


Despite flickering as if he were a candle or something it was still clear his body was every bit solid.
He moved to the next building which was smaller than him.
On the roof was a water tower slash water tank.
He grabbed it with 2 hands and pulled it off its supports.



Next he drank all the water and dropped the tank back on the roof.
He let out a huge belch.
He resumed walking down the block having lost interest in the buildings for now.
Still flickering his footsteps left big footprints and cracks in the pavement.
He had only just taken his 12th step away from the building with the water tower when suddenly a big puff of smoke as big as he was appeared and there was a flash accompanied by a strange sound.



Mere moments later there stood Kouta back at his normal size in the middle of his own freshly created footprint.
Kouta looked around curious and confused.
The growth ray appeared to have worn off unknown to him.
Now Kouta was in a 5 feet deep hole in the shape his own foot from when he was big.
1132121.title: Kouta curiously pokes the building

choices: Uh Oh that growth ray wears off
11322.content:
As Kouta stood back up the toddler spotted a very large tower in the distance.
What caught Kouta's eye was the ice cream cone billboard near the top.


Naturally the toddler didn't realize it wasn't real.


Slowly Kouta starts walking towards the tower.
On the way a few mailboxes get crushed and car but shockingly the most damage is just Kouta's footprints in the pavement.


Finally he reaches the tower but it's no ordinary structure.
Since the planet is several times larger than the earth Kouta is from and there's buildings and towns made to accommodate various giant sized scenarios this building or tower far exceeds the largest human built building on record.



The fact that the structure was significantly larger than Kouta's current 50 foot size didn't phase the toddler.
To him this was like climbing stuff at home that he didn't know better to not climb.


His sights were on the ice cream he didn't realize was fake.


He approached the tower and put his hands on it doing some minor damage.
He then begins to slowly climb up the tower.


Several minutes later he reaches the ice cream cone shaped billboard.
11322.title: He starts climbing the tallest building

113222.content:
Suddenly Kouta felt strange. With the "ice cream" in reach
His body began to flicker almost as if he himself were a hologram or projection.
Despite flickering as if he were a candle or something it was still clear his body was every bit solid.


The fact his body was solid was made all the more evident by the fact he was still clinging to the building.
Unaware of the potential danger he's in Kouta giggles a bit.


Snapping out of it he remembers what he came for.
The "ice cream" was nearly within reach.
Kouta pulls himself up the tower a bit more.
His right hand then reaches for it while his left is holding onto the tower.


He grabs the top of it and pulls. Metal creaks and supports break.
The billboard then falls off the building.
Kouta is about to cry when some dust and debris gets near his nose.



His face contorts and suddenly he sneezes.
To him it was minor but to the building it was like a small tornado.
He wasn't done either. To his viewers the site of what appeared to be a flickering hologram sneezing and doing real damage was a unique one.

"ACHOO"
"ACHOO"
"ACHOO"
"ACHOO"

Each sneeze pummeled the tower and shook it a bit.
Most damage was to neighboring buildings.


Finally came the last and biggest sneeze.
"A-A-A-ACHOOOOOOO"

Much of the surrounding area and face of the tower were covered in a mix of spit and snot.
Kouta used the hand that still wasn't holding the tower to wipe his nose then rubbed the snot on a yet covered part of the tower.
Suddenly a big puff cloud of smoke as big as he was appeared and there was a flash accompanied by a strange sound.


His hand slipped from the shock.
Moments later near the top of the clearing smoke a normal sized Kouta was beginning to free fall.
As luck would have it tho his suspenders caught on an earlier bent piece of metal.



For the moment he was saved but dangling many stories above the ground.
Blissfully unaware of the mortal peril he was in he looked around in awe then clapped and giggled.



"We must initiate a rescue protocol" said a staffer.


Suddenly gravity took over and the metal holding him gave out.
Once more Kouta began to fall.




Now what rescue method do they use?

1 > Portable 2x Growth Ray. Saved by temporary invulnerability

2 > Portable Shrink Ray to slow his decent, lessen impact, and a little added artificial wind
113222.title: Uh Oh that growth ray wears off

1132223.title: Other measures

choices: He starts to explore even more at this new size
200 feet short lived. Hidden Shrink ray! From 200 feet to 2 1/2 inches tall
11323.content:
He not exactly searches per say after all he's either unaware or too young to fully grasp everything but Kouta does explore some more or possibly play a bit innocently unaware of any of the following-
His size changes
His predicament
That the damage he did was real and his actual caretakers aka the aliens slaves had to fix all later.
That his size changes could be temporary or that he was being watched.


To him it was all innocent playtime or curiousity


Kouta now 50 foot tall continues to look around slightly damaging the pavement.
A few blocks away his foot comes down shockingly on an old fashioned phone booth.


This phone booth was no ordinary booth tho as evident by the sign next to it.
As the booth burst apart underneath was another golden pressure plate not unlike the 1st one Kouta had encountered.

The sign read "GROW RAY 3 X"

The pressure sensor was triggered and Kouta had barely a moment to react.
The ray shot out and zapped him surrounding his body then there was another flash like before.

Seconds later Kouta now stood 200 feet tall his foot still on the pressure plate the sign of to the side snapped in two.


Kouta looked around again confused but mostly curious.
Unlike the less powerful ray this one needed slightly more recharge time but 2 minutes later it recharges and zaps Kouta again. Like before it had no visible effects but unknowingly increased the time at which he'd remained 200 feet tall assuming no more ray encounters.


Finally Kouta moved his foot off the sensor. Next...
11323.title: He searches for another growth pad

choices: He begins to cry for some odd reason
He has a playful non malicious rampage with the "toy" city around him
Something or someone catch his attention

Baby Rai

115.title: More youngsters

choices: No time wasted Melanie finds an Ever-Grow Ray
1152.content:
Just gonna dive right in here
———-

There's a certain innocence that comes with
being a toddler. Truthfully, Melanie had no idea
what was going on.
She only had her memories and experiences
up until now.



Every day for her was a new adventure,
a new opportunity to learn and grow.


Last thing Melanie remembered was
It had been a typical day in Metropolis,
Kevin's little sister Melanie had been
playing in the backyard until an alien
discovered what it was looking for.


A beam of light came down and she vanishes.
To her it was merely a flash of light.

One moment she was in her backyard the next next she was in a deserted replica.

An unseen eye in the sky looked at the sign.
"Earth Child Exhibit and Size Change Experiment. See how it will react that circumstances of changing sizes"
"Safety Notice - due to various safety protocols experiment is tuned ONLY to the human specimen and the specimens size will never be enough to pose a threat to our customers"


Eventually Melanie decides to wander around.

Unknown to her her family and friends
had been teleported with her but
the rays would only affect Melanie
1152.title: Melanie

choices: Adam Zellinski - Honey Aliens Took The Kid
1153.content:
Here is even more kids.

Perhaps Adam from the movie Honey I blew up the kid. https://s-media-cache-ak0.pinimg.com/564...

Or maybe my new character.

Aoki: a 4 year old baby who loves Japanese giant monster movies (doesn't wear a diaper or such, like a swimsuit one piece) and would love to be a rampaging giant monster, perhaps the aliens will have to deal with Aokizilla. Green eyes, and short black hair.
1153.title: More kids

11531.content:
It had only been a month since 2 year old
Adam Szalinski had been turned into a growing
giant by his fathers invention.


Life had seemingly gone back to normal however
the next adventure was just around the corner.


One afternoon the sky went dark.
The family didn’t know what to think until
Wayne spotted an alien ship of unimaginable size.


There was no time to react as a huge beam enveloped
the neighborhood.
The entire main cast from previous events
was conveniently gathered in the same
neighborhood and disappeared.


Moments later their neighborhood was
suddenly surrounded by a city and suburbs
they didn’t recognize.


They had all been transported to
an infinitely larger clone of Earth.
Many of Wayne’s inventions suddenly ceased
to work.


To them what was an instant moment was
unknowingly days and any useful invention
Wayne had that could counter the situation at
hand was disabled.


The aliens had seen what happened with
2 year old Adam Szalinski and deemed
him a good test subject.


The others were unimportant and unfortunate
bystanders for this unique alien zoo and experiment.


Now what happens when about
3 dozen earthlings and 1 toddler are on
another Earth and worse there’s
Thousands of growth rays that ONLY
WORK ON ADAM and some shrinking rays
that work on anyone cause the aliens thought
that Would make things more interesting.
11531.title: Adam Zellinski - Honey Aliens Took The Kid

choices: To a nearby empty city that’s not quite Vegas
115311.content:
More movie info @ https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Honey,_I...
————-

Adam had been left to play in the backyard
while the Szalinski family and their acquaintances
explore.


Unfortunately they’d soon get a taste of
history repeating itself and the nature of
their new planet.


Nick and Mandy enter the backyard to
check on Adam as the mischievous and
curious yet well meaning tyke is
walking towards a strangely placed golden
pad.


Nick notices the sign.
“Grow Ray 2X - Protoype”

This particular one had its calibration a little
off but that didn’t matter.


“ADAM NO DONT” yelled Nick


Alas it was too late Adam stepped on the
golden pressure plate.
Instantly a beam oddly similar to Wayne’s
machine but with more lighting or electricity
seemingly mixed in struck Adam.


Nick and Mandy watched helplessly as
they got to see what they’d missed
missed when Adam grew in his previous size
exploits.


Energy surrounds Adam and in a swirl
of light and energy he begins to
clothes and all.


Adam giggled at the strange feelings.


In a matter of about 45 seconds Adam
up to 165 feet tall
a few stories taller than he had been
in Las Vegas before his parents cured his
gigantic size.


Adam looks around.
He’s oblivious that the pad he is still
standing on powers up and zaps him again.


It has no added noticeable effects but
what none of them realize is that it’s increasing
the amount of time before the Ray will wear off.


Adam looks around some more and
a minute later the pad zaps him again.
Finally Adam decides to move.

He steps a few steps from the yard
unknowingly stepping on another
“Grow Ray 2x” not labeled prototype.


Getting another zap that does nothing except
increase his time spent big.
Adam then heads______
115311.title: Deja-Vu Adam blows up again!

11533.title: More kids

Normal story lines with random shrink/growth(2)
115331.content:
It was seemingly a typical day at
Shiny Starts Day Care Center.

Daycare trainee Michelle Mitchell had just finished changing one of her charges

Amy Jones -
a 3 year and 10 months old girl with blonde hair ,
ponytails , green eyes and pink overalls

short for her age at 2 ft 3 inches at normal size.
Friendly, curious, somewhat smart for her age.


Michelle was about to give Amy her morning snack when there was a blinding flash.
Amy had vanished never to be seen again.


Amy for her part was oblivious to the panic ensuing over her disappearance.
Amy suddenly reappeared in an empty replica of the daycare.
The only difference was all the doors were open.
For her part she didn’t fully grasp what happened.


“Huh where’d everyone go? Are they playing hide and seek”

Amy went to look around.
She soon wandered out to the playground.


—————-
Now before continuing what version off the story will this be?

———————————

One day a toddler named Max was being babysat.
His babysitters Yvonne and her friend
John had just finished giving Max a bath and
another potty training lesson.

Yvonne had stepped out to get Max some
clothes when there was a blinding flash throughout
the house.


Yvonne and John rush to the bathroom to see
Max gone.


All Max knew is one moment he just finished
going potty and the next he was suddenly in
an unfamiliar backyard still undressed.


Unknown to Max he was on a replica of
Earth built by aliens called New Mars
except it was hundreds of thousands of times
larger and had a few differences custom tailored
to him and some situations Max may soon find
himself in.

Next______

155.title: More teens

info.brief_description: Idea from a game! Size changing adventures galore read more inside
info.description:
Warning: Contains Size changing content
Recommended for folks into size or macro content tho


Based on the old Sega/ Sega Genesis Game
"Taz Escape From Mars"

Story Does NOT have Taz just basing this on a portion of the game

Game info here
https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Taz_in_Escape_from_Mars

Or

https://www.google.com/search?site=&source=hp&ei=0jjEVbqeD4SlepPpr7gL&q=taz+esca...


Much like the premise of the Game


An Alien in this case a gigantic Alien so large most planets are bug size is searching for creatures for its Zoo. The zoo in question consists of dozens of exhibits each exhibit given its own planet for other gigantic Aliens of various sizes to observe and enjoy.



The Alien in this story whom is mostly unseen sets its sights on Earth and Abducts an Earthling/Human teen or Child preferably female and transports them to a replica of Mars but modified to be like Eart buildings cities and all


The only thing missing? Other humans! Instead Alien Caretakers the average size of adult humans enslaved are forced to tend to the exhibits.


The other thing about this planet
For some stupid reason or other there are Rays ALL Over the planet that ONLY Work on the Human

***Edit 9/19/2017 - Now introducing another idea
The Mega-Verse ( yes kinda stolen from Sailor Moon but much different idea ) it'll be explained inside ***

Like in the game there are

Growth Rays
http://youtu.be/F_dfHmpcBso


And Shrink Rays
http://youtu.be/x99Bp4M-UIU


Plus cloning rays that will make clones of the kidnapped human

ALL Rays will always have a sign/label like so

https://twitter.com/pklewd2015/status/629529039234052096


To keep things interesting the rays unlike the fan will have more variety

Size Rays can last anywhere from
1 minute to No Limit until another Ray is encountered


Also there will be different "Grow Rays"
As follows:

Standard Grow Ray
Will be labeled "Grow Ray" and make the target 50 Feet tall

Other signs/labels/effects are
"Grow Ray 2X"

Target becomes 100 Feet Tall

"Grow Ray 3X"
Target becomes 200 Feet Tall

"Super Grow Ray"
Target becomes 500 Feet Tall

"Ultra Grow Ray"
1000 Feet Tall

"Mega Grow Ray"
3000 Feet Tall

"Mega Mega Grow Ray"
10,000 Feet Tall

"Supreme Grow Ray"
30x the size of Earth

Shrink Ray only has 1 size
And that is 2 1/2 inches tall



So have fun enjoy the adventure and have fun escaping or not escaping New Mars

Note: Growth/Shrinking may be slow, fast or instant

Rules:

1- ONLY 1 Earthling ( Human ) may change sizes

2: Stick to the sizes above

3 - NO Scat , potty stuff etc.

4 - unlike in the game the Shrunken or Enlarged person becomes invulnerable

5 - keep blood and guts talk to a bare minimum

6 - decent grammar/spelling please

7 - try to keep the story going as long as possible or if the person escapes back to Earth have the alien get a new person for the size changing Earthling exhibit


8 - Have Fun

9 - as always I reserve the right to edit or delete chapters for various reasons
